# Admission

[](https://www.mpathimagery.net/)

We are excited to welcome you to the Old Colony History Museum. Our collection brings the past to life, sharing the rich and diverse experiences that shape our world today. We can’t wait to welcome you for your next historical adventure!

[Get Tickets __](https://secure.qgiv.com/for/museumadmission/event/dailyadmission/)

# Hours

Tuesday-Saturday | 10 am – 4 pm  
---|---  
After Hours Programs | Times vary; check out the details on our [Calendar of Events](https://www.oldcolonyhistorymuseum.org/events/)  
Sunday-Monday | closed  
Closed on holidays and Saturdays of holiday weekends. | Weather-related changes will be announced on our [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/Old-Colony-History-Museum-189510831472/?ref=hl).  
  
# Admission

Members | Free  
---|---  
Adults | $5  
Students | $3  
Seniors (62+) | $3  
Kids (12 and under) | Free  
  
The Museum is best explored at your own pace, but we do offer a guided highlights tour at noon free with admission.

# Our Location

### Located on Historic Church Green in Taunton, MA.

### GPS/Mailing address: [66 Church Green, Taunton MA, 02780](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//66+Church+Green,+Taunton,+MA+02780/@41.901242,-71.0870178,17z/data=!4m13!1m4!3m3!1s0x89e48cad0c14ee39:0xc56ed3d28ec66d93!2s66+Church+Green,+Taunton,+MA+02780!3b1!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x89e48c...

Membership[oldcolony](https://www.oldcolonyhistorymuseum.org/author/oldcolony/ "Posts by oldcolony")2026-01-06T20:57:06+00:00

# OCHM Members bring meaning to the history of the Old Colony region and help ensure the future of our organization through preservation and accessibility. Your support enhances our ability to foster innovation, inclusivity, and community.

## All members enjoy **discounted research rates** , savings in **OCHM Gift Shop** and with**select local businesses** , our **monthly e-newsletter** , and a**mailed events postcard**. Plus, members get **exclusive early access** to tickets for special events* before they go on sale to the public.

*Registration is required for all OCHM Experiences and Member-only events.

# Individual

### $35 for 12 months

[Join or Renew](https://secure.qgiv.com/for/ochmmembershippage)

**Access exclusive benefits for one person.**

One (1) Member Card

Admission for one (1) to the Museum and Hurley Library

Member pricing for OCHM Experiences*

Invitation for one (1) to Member-only events*

# Family

### $65 for 12 months

[Join or Renew](https://secure.qgiv.com/for/ochmmembershippage)

**Benefits designed for the whole family. This level covers 2 named adults and any children or grandchildren under the age of 13.**

Two (2) Member Cards

Admission for up to four (4) adults to the Museum and Hurley Library

Member pricing for OCHM Experiences*

Invitation for two (2) to Member-only events*

collections_text:
HOME[oldcolony](https://www.oldcolonyhistorymuseum.org/author/oldcolony/ "Posts by oldcolony")2025-11-29T18:31:56+00:00

The history of the original Old Colony is one that reaches from Rehoboth to Provincetown, and from Scituate to Dartmouth. It’s as distant as 1639 and as relevant as a moment ago. It is a history that plays like a page-turner, replete with epic battles, brash entrepreneurs, new-for-the-time technologies – and the stuff of everyday life. Things that happened in the Old Colony made the region what it is today and frequently influenced events worldwide.

At the Old Colony History Museum, we’re proud to be the keeper of this history. It is our ongoing mission to be able to bring it to life for the region’s families and children as well as historians of every age. Open year-round, we curate exhibits and offer guided tours, lectures, workshops, field trips and special presentations for school groups. We invite you to join us, to personally experience our collective past in a way unique to our region.
